attributes.action: Push for wind turbines on the Isle of Wight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a campaign to counter thWART's constant efforts to ban wind turbines. With a quarter of Island households currently struggling to heat their homes, we no longer accept selfish reason's of "imperfect skylines" to justify other Islanders' suffering - not just this winter but also in the long run. 

Evidently, long-term plans are not in thWART's interests. 

The younger generations' futures are being decided when they themselves had not had a voice, until now. 

Please sign this petition if you want the Isle of Wight to be host to wind turbines.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Push for wind turbines on the Isle of Wight."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19045


Prime Minister's Office
